= Blocks-World Subgoaling Agent with Reinforcement Learning =
This agent simulates an omniscient taxi driver that uses reinforcement learning and hierarchical task decomposition to improve its performance over runs.

=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Hierarchical task decomposition
  * Reinforcement learning
  
=== Download Links===
  *  The agent is included in the Taxi download.
  
=== External Environment ===
  * [Domains_Taxi Taxi Domain]

=== Default Rules ===
  * None.

=== Associated Publications ===
  * Bloch, M.K. _[http://www.eecs.umich.edu/~soar/sitemaker/docs/pubs/bazald_-_tr1.pdf Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning in the Taxicab Domain.]_ (Report No. CCA-TR-2009-02). Ann Arbor, MI: Center for Cognitive Architecture, University of Michigan. (2009)
